title: LFC_Bitcoin
author: LFC_Bitcoin
content: Your boy LFC_Bitcoin hits 20,000 posts here on bitcointalk. 20,000 posts and 7146 Earned Merit, maybe I need to go outside a bit more  10 years in bitcoin now, itâ€™s been a real journey and will continue to be. Bitcoin has given me everything, itâ€™s one of the best things that ever happened to me. Being an early adopter gave me opportunities I never would have had otherwise. Iâ€™ve really enjoyed myself on the forum too and made some real life friends. Here are some of the stats I have on https://bpip.org/This forum is one of the very best places to learn about bitcoin. Iâ€™ve picked up so much knowledge here in 10 years. Iâ€™ve learnt things that are not readily available elsewhere so let me raise a glass to everybody, Legendary Members and Noobs.

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: Congratulations LFC_Bitcoin. Let us continue to enjoy this forum.Quote from: LFC_Bitcoin on May 23, 2023, 03:37:30 PMYour boy LFC_Bitcoin hits 20,000 posts here on bitcointalk. 20,000 posts and 7146 Earned Merit, maybe I need to go outside a bit more  8146 merits, not 7146 merits. Maybe you did not calculate the 1000 merits given at the start of merit system, but you deserved it and earned it too as you were legendary already when you were given.Quote from: LFC_Bitcoin on May 23, 2023, 03:37:30 PMThis forum is one of the very best places to learn about bitcoin. Iâ€™ve picked up so much knowledge here in 10 years. Iâ€™ve learnt things that are not readily available elsewhere so let me raise a glass to everybody, Legendary Members and Noobs.Â  This forum has been much more for me because this forum thought me how to know scam, which was not like that before. I have known a lot about life which is helpful since when I joined this forum.

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Quote from: _act_ on May 23, 2023, 03:44:19 PMQuote from: LFC_Bitcoin on May 23, 2023, 03:37:30 PMYour boy LFC_Bitcoin hits 20,000 posts here on bitcointalk. 20,000 posts and 7146 Earned Merit, maybe I need to go outside a bit more  8146 merits, not 7146 merits.Look at the blue part again. He said Earned, which means the other 1000 were airdroppedOtherwise, Congs LFC_Bitcoin, 20K posts is no joke. I am almost 5 years in this forum, and I am not even past 5K postsÂ  You inspire many via contribution in the forum and character.

comments.author: salad daging
comments.body: Congrats @LFC_Bitcoin on a new milestone with 20000 posts today.It's nothing else it's been a long journey until you can make a good contribution while on the forum, actually it's not easy to achieve such a big post but because you are consistently on the forum it's the best place to learn for those who want to know about it and this one of the best forums for bitcoin.Next trip maybe 10000 merit

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: Congratulations, sir, LFC_Bitcoin. This is a great achievement, plus the fact that you have had some advantages from Bitcoin, which makes you happy to be early in the Bitcoin space. This topic also stands as a motivation to me, and I hope one day I will also tell the story and make reference to your thread, which was a great motivation to me. On the day I will count my ten years into Bitcoin, I hope I get so very proud of myself more than I already am for being into Bitcoin technology too.Congratulations sir, next target ðŸŽ¯ is 30k post.

comments.author: Mr.suevie
comments.body: Wow!! This is some milestone achieved, congratulations sir on your achievement and I believe this is just a stepping stone to your full achievements as you are clearly a dedicated member to help and growth of this Wonderful journey we are all in now. Bitcoin and this community has certainly been of great impact to the live of many in the world today and especially those that were opportune to come across it in its early stages, I envy you sir but in a good way I hope one day me myself will achieve such great height you have achieved or even more greater height during this journey in the cryptospace.Once again congratulations LFC_Bitcoin on your achievement.

comments.author: Dunamisx
comments.body: Quote from: LFC_Bitcoin on May 23, 2023, 03:37:30 PMYour boy LFC_Bitcoin hits 20,000 posts here on bitcointalk. 20,000 posts and 7146 Earned Merit, maybe I need to go outside a bit more  What a wonderful achievement! twenty thousand posts is not a twenty post but a huge success accrued over the years on bitcointalk, you have althrough this achieved alot in learning and developing yourself to whom you turned to be today, you're not only being beneficial to yourself alone but an asset to the forum at large, you've given it all it takes to achieve this and therefore it's worth deserving for you.Quote from: LFC_Bitcoin on May 23, 2023, 03:37:30 PM10 years in bitcoin now, itâ€™s been a real journey and will continue to be. Bitcoin has given me everything, itâ€™s one of the best things that ever happened to me. Being an early adopter gave me opportunities I never would have had otherwise. Iâ€™ve really enjoyed myself on the forum too and made some real life friends.You have joined the number of people whom we can be proud of learning through them and be their trail blazers, how i wish am also part of the early birds on bitcoin, but nevertheless, we are moving closer each day, no one ever had an encounter with the forum or bitcoin and remain thesame, this is just the beginning for you, you're getting there to also celebrate your 10,000 merits soon Â  Congratulations!

comments.author: imamusma
comments.body: Congratulations for the milestone you've made in 10 years, this must be special to celebrate with the community.Being an early adopter of bitcoin has made you more special than others because most of us just came after you. I hope you are never satisfied with what you have achieved in these 10 years, so it will definitely continue. Your loyalty to the forum has been tested, you definitely deserve a special badge for that loyalty. Once again, congrats to you @LFC_Bitcoin.

comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: Quote from: LFC_Bitcoin on May 23, 2023, 03:37:30 PMBeing an early adopter gave me opportunities I never would have had otherwise. Iâ€™ve really enjoyed myself on the forum too and made some real life friends. Luckily I got in on the space before reaching the first decade of the bitcoin journey, as I believe the next few decades will be a time of regret for many.QuoteThis forum is one of the very best places to learn about bitcoin. Well, here is an interactive school with the most comprehensive and full-time lessons of any bitcoin school out there (if there is one), as well as a great side business market.So yeah, congrats on your great achievement, boy LFC_Bitcoin

comments.author: LoyceMobile
comments.body: Outside is overrated! Congrats!Race me to 50,000?

comments.author: ScamViruS
comments.body: Quote from: LFC_Bitcoin on May 23, 2023, 03:37:30 PMYour boy LFC_Bitcoin hits 20,000 posts here on bitcointalk. 20,000 posts and 7146 Earned Merit, maybe I need to go outside a bit more  After spending four years on this forum I still haven't crossed 4000 posts. So 20000 posts is not a common thing, you have spent a lot of time on this forum. Seeing users like you inspires me to change my posting habits as I have been posting less for a while now. Congratulations to you for achieving so much on this forum, and being an early adopter of Bitcoin.

comments.author: ajiz138
comments.body: It turns out that I am a little older than you, but I still look like a baby even though you have become a big boy.Â  I can only congratulate you on this long journey, I don't know how long I will be able to surpass 20k posts but it will take a few more years to travel. LOLThat is bitcoin can give everything that has been obtained from bitcoin, I believe bitcoin can change everything

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: LoyceMobile on May 23, 2023, 05:34:40 PMOutside is overrated! Congrats!Race me to 50,000?I was about to write that my boy needs to look for a 50k next time. But it seems you came up with a better motivation for him. Why don't others have something to have fun from it?Let's play a game.The odd for LFC to reach 50k first is 2.90 and for you [LoyceV] 1.43Last time to bet 30th May 2023 Universal Time.Maximum bet $100. One account one forum member, meaning no alternative account.Total bet amount from an account is no more than $100If found LFC and LoyceV are manipulating the result then all bets will declare void. Stakes will be returned [deducting transaction fees]Total bankroll: $3000Who wants me to drop a BTC address to active the market? ðŸ¤£Congratulations by boy @LFC_Bitcoin

Iâ€™ve really enjoyed myself on the forum too and made some real life friends. Here are some of the stats I have on https://bpip.org/Code:[img]https://i.ibb.co/JQXFG1x/IMG-4504.jpg[/img]This forum is one of the very best places to learn about bitcoin. Iâ€™ve picked up so much knowledge here in 10 years. Iâ€™ve learnt things that are not readily available elsewhere so let me raise a glass to everybody, Legendary Members and Noobs.LFC_Bitcoin, let me post a picture of your achievement from bpip via Laptop for better view. The only thing not highlighted in the picture is that you are the 15th user who has distributed 20146 merit 9806 times, to 1345 profiles (at this times). Some users may not be aware of it, so they should know about it by now.Of course I also congratulate you on your achievement, the next target will only be determined by you.

comments.author: _BlackStar
comments.body: Quote from: LFC_Bitcoin on May 23, 2023, 03:37:30 PMThis forum is one of the very best places to learn about bitcoin. Iâ€™ve picked up so much knowledge here in 10 years. Iâ€™ve learnt things that are not readily available elsewhere so let me raise a glass to everybody, Legendary Members and Noobs.Actually you forgot to tell us that you have made 20,256 posts so far and you have a ratio of 540 posts made per post deleted [posts deleted by moderators 37]. You also forgot that you have favorite topic that proves your love for bitcoin, namely WO, which is then followed by several gambling topics. But before that, congrats on your achievement, LFC_Bitcoin.Ninjastic.space told me about it, it's like the one in the image below.Quote from: rat03gopoh on May 23, 2023, 05:31:37 PMLuckily I got in on the space before reaching the first decade of the bitcoin journey, as I believe the next few decades will be a time of regret for many.I'm here after the first decade has passed, but I hope I won't regret it - we all have a chance even if we aren't early adopters.

You made a good mark here since you are one of biggest contributor of the casino I follow also here in forum. This place became more better if more contributors will came and Â this achievement deserve a celebration knowing how hard to earn that number of quality post.Hope to see more excellent post and generosity keep it up.

comments.author: DaNNy001
comments.body: Quote from: LFC_Bitcoin on May 23, 2023, 03:37:30 PMYour boy LFC_Bitcoin hits 20,000 posts here on bitcointalk. 20,000 posts and 7146 Earned Merit, maybe I need to go outside a bit more  10 years in bitcoin now, itâ€™s been a real journey and will continue to be. Bitcoin has given me everything, itâ€™s one of the best things that ever happened to me. Being an early adopter gave me opportunities I never would have had otherwise. Iâ€™ve really enjoyed myself on the forum too and made some real life friends. Congratulations good sir on this great achievement and when I come to look at your stats it kinda scares me and also motivates me to seeing that such great achievements is actually attainable. Must have been quite difficult on your way here but no matter the strides you were still able to achieve such impressive work. This journey is a big one for everyone but seeing such achievement here in the forum is what keeps most of us going and knowing fully well that we might all get there someday. Your contribution to Â this Wonderful community has been immense and hope that you continue and keep adding value through your various works and post here in the forum.Congratulations once more and I believe this is also the start to your achievements.

comments.author: notblox1
comments.body: Quote from: LFC_Bitcoin on May 23, 2023, 03:37:30 PMYour boy LFC_Bitcoin hits 20,000 posts here on bitcointalk. 20,000 posts and 7146 Earned Merit, maybe I need to go outside a bit more  Congrats!That is one amazing round number, but dont stop now, next is 30,000! comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Quote from: LFC_Bitcoin on May 23, 2023, 03:37:30 PMYour boy LFC_Bitcoin hits 20,000 posts here on bitcointalk. 20,000 posts and 7146 Earned Merit, maybe I need to go outside a bit more  Another's testimonyâ€”this is the kind of thing I love reading and derive my encouragement from. Congratulations! You deserve all the congratulations, and this is as a reward for your full dedication and that of a true Bitcoiner who has also dedicated their time to a true Bitcoin forum. It's a multiple achievement badge all at the same time. Congratulations once again, and I hope to see your next celebration of 10â€“20k merits next yearÂ Your post count just looks like imagination to me; 20,000 will probably take me the next 10 years to achieve.
